SELECT USR_ID , USR_NM , DEPT_ID , SF_ADM7000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NAME , EMAIL , TELNO , SF_ADM2000_USR_AUTH_GRP_NM(#licGrpId#, #prjId#, USR_ID, #authGrpIdList#, #acceptUseCd#) AS AUTH_GRP_NM FROM ( SELECT B.USR_ID , B.USR_NM , B.DEPT_ID , B.EMAIL , B.TELNO FROM ADM1300 A INNER JOIN ADM2000 B ON ( A.USR_ID = B.USR_ID ) INNER JOIN ADM1100 C ON ( B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = C.AUTH_GRP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.USE_CD = '01' /* 사용유무 사용인 권한만 조회 */ AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID
AND B.USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchPopTxt#||'%'
AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID IN ( $authGrpIds$ )
AND C.ACCEPT_USE_CD = #acceptUseCd#
GROUP BY B.USR_ID, B.USR_NM, B.DEPT_ID, B.EMAIL, B.TELNO ) T
